div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 667 Gjonmë, 10 km. SW of Elbasan, Al- bania, 1960 Burial: c. 48 B.C. Contents: 51 AR. Pot hoard Apollonia: 25 dr. Dyrrhachium: 25 dr. Roman Rep.: 1 den. (59 B.C.) Disposition: Elbasan † Ceka, Studiyne Histonike 1 (1966), pp. 5, 13, 37 (in Albanian; French summary); Studia Albanica 1 (1966), p. 217
